title: Bistrot Merizzi
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available.  As of Nov 2015, the only restaurant in the Valtellina region serving vegan dishes and offering a vegan menu. Waiters speak English. A five-minute 5 walk from Unesco World Heritage train station for Bernina Express (Tirano to St Moritz). Free Wi-Fi.
